item.title: Top OpenAI, Google Brain researchers set off a $300M VC frenzy for their startup Periodic Labs
item.description: When Liam Fedus announced he was quitting OpenAI, VCs swarmed. One even wrote a love letter. Here's how Felicis' Peter Deng won the deal.

item.title: U.S. and Australia sign $3B critical minerals deal
item.description: Leaders of the country's governments announced they would work together to secure critical minerals supplies outside of Chinese control. The deal incl...

item.title: Meta AI’s app downloads and daily users spiked after launch of ‘Vibes’ AI video feed
item.description: New data from Similarweb shows Meta AI’s mobile app is surging in popularity, jumping from 775,000 to 2.7 million daily active users in just four week...

item.title: Trump DOE confirms it’s canceling over $700M in manufacturing grants
item.description: The Department of Energy said it was canceling grants to build new factories in places like Alabama and Kentucky. Three startups are affected.

item.title: Anthropic brings Claude Code to the web
item.description: Anthropic now lets developers spin up Claude Code agents, and manage them, from their web browser on desktop and mobile.
